front.title: Motivation for developing Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Encapsulation / Decapsulation Technology (SA46T)

abstract.t: This document describe a motivation for developing IPv4 over IPv6 encapsulation / decapsulation solution from standing position of Stateless Autimatic IPv4 over IPv6 Encapsulation / Decapsulation Technology (SA46T) and SA46T with address sharing (SA46T-AS).
